review: Very polite and friendly doctor.  We reached at the appointed time and did not have to wait. My daughter was a little anxious about the procedure. But he was able to make her relax and was very gentle. Took time to explain what was the problem and what he was doing.  Carried out the procedure with very little discomfort to my daughter. She was not at all anxious in the repeat visits. Very transparent about billing too. Recommend whole heartedly.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My wife went for wisdom Tooth extraction which was ₹5000 and was done ok. in the followup visit after 10 days Dr Agarwal  removed the extraction stitches but did additional 3 fillings and de-scaling work without  her consent and then presented a bill of over ₹5000 for this additional work.  We did not think that was professional and fair.  We want to caution future patients to be careful.  Dr. Agarwal should be more transparent in his billing practice and obtain proper consent before undertaking procedures..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was scared of removing my impacted lower wisdom tooth since 3 years. As it was continuously paining in every 4-5 months, I got fed up and checked for any good dentist nearby. I read many reviews and found Dr. Rajeev. So I called and booked an appointment. He saw it and explained everything in detail through xray. After two days my impacted wisdom tooth was removed through surgery without pain. Healing process was quit long bcz of surgery but he was always there for any queries. Now my stitches are removed and it’s improving day by day.  

I would definitely recommend the doctor for: 
His professionalism 
Post surgery follow up
Following covid protocols
Clean office 

I am highly satisfied with the treatment. Thank you Muskan Dental & Implant Clinic.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for such a explanatory and nice review

workmanship was outstanding while rebuilding the tooth.  .

review: I went to Dr Rajeev for my root canal treatment recently & was extremely scared of the treatment in the beginning. However, he made sure it was a totally painless experience. He started the treatment by giving me full clarity on what he would do. He also ensured at each step he takes enough time & continuously checked on whether it was hurting or not. He is one of the best dentists in town. Very gentle, calm & great at what he does. He also ensures full comfort of the patient. I would highly highly recommend Dr Rajeev.
